title: Blog Post Schema
description: The Blog Post Archetype - Essential properties that define a blog post

body.description: Main text of the blog post

category.description: General category of the blog post, e.g. Programming

subcategory.description: Specific category of the blog post, e.g. Javascript

publish_date.description: Date and time of publication in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

video_archtype.description: Video Archetype ID to use as the video of this blog post

thumbnail_image_archetype.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the thumbnail image of this blog post

_id.description: Unique identifier for this blog post

created.description: Date and time the blog post was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time the blog post was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD
